Others: The Miami Heat lost to the Indiana Pacers, 128-115.
Kel'el Ware had a career-high 25 points for the Heat.
Tyrese Halliburton scored 33 points and had 15 assists for the Pacers.
Pascal Siakam and Myles Turner also had strong performances for the Pacers.
Jimmy Butler demanded a trade out of Miami after the game.
